My Work

Check out some of my projects...

Blog where you can post new articles, make comments, like articles, etc. This project was a complete blog with so many features. The project include a user authentication system, as well as user validations for emails and passwords. It also includes categories for articles and the relationship between these two.

Project Github

This project is a clone of Dribble that have some features based on the original app. The project include a user authentication system, as well as user validations for emails and passwords. It includes features like uploading images, making comments and liking posts. It also counts views on each post.

Project Github

Chat application build with Action cable where the user can send messages in real time, it also inludes user authentication system. It has a clean design using Semantic UI.

Project Github

This project was a clone of Tweeter, that allows the user to create and account, log in and create new tweets. It also includes features of a user authentication system. The user can delete their on comments and tweets as well as make new comments in other users's tweets.

Project Github

Project developed with HTML5, CSS3 and Bootstrap that shows a responsive web design of NewsWeek homepage.

Project Github

Project developed with HTML5 and CSS3, JQuery, JavaScript and my own framework, that shows a responsive web design of Github homepage. In this project I used my own framework to work with a grid, columns, row and styles in a general way.

Project Github

Project developed with HTML5 and CSS3 that shows a responsive web design of TheNextWeb homepage.

Project Github

Project developed with HTML5 and CSS3 that shows a responsive web design of a NYT Article homepage.
